tags: Value for money,
review: My father-in-law(FIL) was having severe tooth pain. We visited Mr. Shujath Ali in Manipal hospital. With an x-ray, Mr. Ali concluded that 2 RCs and 2 wisdom tooth extractions need to be done. While we were a bit sceptical in doing the RC since uncle was planning a travel the next day, Mr. Ali suggested to do the extraction and later do the RC in Chennai (my FIL's native where he periodically consults a dentist) since FIL was groaning in pain. Mr. Ali also asked me to click a pic of the x-ray since printing the same would incur additional charges. Additionally, Mr. Ali also mentioned that the extraction procedure done was reimbursable with an insurance. I did not even think twice to say yes because i was already moved by his gesture earlier and thought that the extraction cost would be marginal given that the cost of RC itself is 4K. My FIL told me that the procedure was neatly done and it was completely painless. However, we were charged Rs. 9200 for the procedure which was super exorbitant. The receptionist told me that dental procedure will not be covered under insurance. Oh yes, i knew that i thought. But, Mr. Ali told that the procedure he did can be covered. Mr. Ali came out casually and asked the receptionist on why the amount cannot be covered ** ** ** *** *** ***** ** *** ***** I should have questioned and got things clarified in the beginning only i thought. **** * **** ** **** ***** ** *** *** ** ** *** ********* *** ** **** *** *** * ****** ***** **** ******** **** ***** * ********** **** ** ******* *** ** ***** ***** *** ********** ** ** *** ***** ******* *** ****** A humble clinic in the vicinity is where we usually go. However, they had to be shut because of the lockdown. This was our first time with Manipal. Lesson Learnt!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have Densit issues from my childhood itself, I  was tablets to control the pain after joining for teaching profession I  was facing difficulties  which I could not be free  also enthusiastic  what ever I want  getting disappoint. Later, I  heard that My brother always appreciates Manipal hospital  Bangalore  I decided to visit Manipal hospital and came alone from Tiptur there luckily recitionist  has booked my appointment with Dr  Sujath Ali, I took treatment with him.and got free from my dental issues  after 18 years years again  I came  back to the same doctor for the treatment, many people.are facing dental problems even after treatment  at different dentists,  even it's far from my native  I will come here I have suggest my friends they also took treatment and.happy one of my friend thanked me for suggesting the selected dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Hey there! So, I recently visited a dentist and I wanted to share my feedback with you. Overall, I had a great experience! The dentist was really friendly and made me feel comfortable throughout the appointment. The clinic was clean and well-maintained, which is always a plus. The dentist explained everything clearly and answered all my questions. The treatment itself was efficient and I felt like I was in good hands. I would definitely recommend this dentist if you're looking for a positive dental experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a problem with my 20 year old root canal teeth which got damaged and led to severe infection. An implant was discussed as the tooth was loose.\nI was given clear information and guidance throughout the whole process, before, during and after by Dr Mir Shujath Ali. Dr was always at the end of the phone if I needed help and reassurance.\nAs the Tooth in question was a front visible one, I am glad that he was there. Finally I can smile again. Having the implant has become one of the best decisions I have made.\
reply_text: Thank you. Appreciate the appreciation. Wish you all the best.

review: I would say that Doctors like him are heaven sent. Dental clinics in Bangalore are like beauty parlours and hence it is very difficult to find a doctor who is truly good at work. I was in terrible pain when I went to him with a messed up tooth. It just took him a few minutes to find out the issue and in next few minutes I was relieved. I would recommend anyone who is looking for a good dentist should visit him even if it means travelling a bit.

I would highly recommend this clinic .

review:
Dr. Sujath Ali is an extremely talented and friendly dentist. He took enough time to examine my ignored dental health and successfully planned and executed a series of procedures such as root canals, tooth extraction, surgical corrections and dentures. 
I am aged over 60 with diabetes, so he was extremely careful with my pre existing conditions. 
I highly recommend Dr.Sujath Ali and his team.
